content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft yellow wool, I first need to craft yellow dye and white wool. The sunflower at slot 26 can be used to craft yellow dye. Therefore, I will move the sunflower to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: The sunflower has been crafted into yellow dye, so I will move the dye from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: I have 2 yellow_dye, but I need 3. Therefore I need to craft another one. To do so, I need to place 4 string in a square formation. I will start by moving the string to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: I still need to fill in the rest of the slots for the recipe. The next slot to fill is slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: The next slot to fill is slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: The next slot to fill is slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I have enough ingredients to craft the yellow_dye. I will move the resulting white_wool to an open inventory slot (12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft yellow wool, I need to place 1 yellow dye and 1 white wool in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the yellow dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the yellow dye is in the crafting table, I will move the white wool from slot 12 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_wool
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 32, "index": 23}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the yellow wool is crafted, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
